name: Photographer
description:
As a photographer, you can start with the model's hairstyle, makeup and clothing, and create unique works with various props.

As a photographer, you can fight for money by fulfilling the requirements of customers, so as to unlock more clothes and props.

As a photographer, you can cultivate your own model and play with her.

As a photographer, play with you



Main contents:

  • Set up the studio in the first person
  • Choose hairstyle, make-up and clothes for models
  • Choose the body posture, gesture and expression of the model. Adjust the pose of the model from the first perspective
  • Free camera perspective
  • Rich shooting props that can be unlocked
